TopicTitle: My itteration of the X-Wing from Star Wars!

Articles.Content: So, I was working on this, and it came out SOOOOO good! You can tilt the wings (parallel by default) like the real one, and it looks cool too! The wings are a bit wobbly, but that doesn't seem to mess up the aerodynamics. Tell me what you think!
Awesome craft man! Hopefully more Star Wars fans play KSP so we get more Star Wars Ships.

Awesome craft man! Hopefully more Star Wars fans play KSP so we get more Star Wars Ships.

Thanks! I'm not actually a fan of Star Wars. I just thaught it was cool to make that ship. If only I could colour it though...

Thanks! I'm not actually a fan of Star Wars. I just thaught it was cool to make that ship. If only I could colour it though...

Kerbpaint would be your best option, though that only works with stock parts, and it hasn't been updated since .24, but still works.
Really sweet, but I don't entirely get the extra cockpit on the front. Was it that there were no other parts that would fit decently?

Really sweet, but I don't entirely get the extra cockpit on the front. Was it that there were no other parts that would fit decently?

That's exactly it. Unless your talking about the one with the science containers, that was SUPPOSED to be RD-D2, but... meh.
You are dealing with a scale problem. Not too bad, not really good tho. If its not going to be "stock" you may aswell go for tweakscale and solve your scale "problems".
